QuestData.Title: The Dragon at the Door
QuestData.Description:
That blue dragon will collapse the creche and trap us inside!
He claims to serve Malygos. That name is familiar, but... why would any dragon want to keep us prisoner?
Listen, $p. We were trained to fight beside the dragons, not against them. But we have been left with no choice.
Time to do what must be done, evoker.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Lapisagos and escape the War Creche.
QuestData.RewardText:
We will get that rubble cleared and make sure no dracthyr is left behind.
But first, we need to secure this area.
